game.name: ODDCORE
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You have only 5 minutes to stylishly explode your way through the hordes of corrupted entities in a retro FPS, roguelike liminal-nightmare... and Timmee is here to help!
game.shortDescriptionEn: You have only 5 minutes to stylishly explode your way through the hordes of corrupted entities in a retro FPS, roguelike liminal-nightmare... and Timmee is here to help!

reviewHighlights.text: [i] Backrooms Ultrakill Roguelike on LSD, delivered direct to your veins. Imagine Ultrakill and Risk of Rain 2 hooking up and birthing an ADHD child t...
No idea what I just played but I need it injected straight into my veins. This game is great.
